description: Ladybells (Adenophora liliifolia) are a beautiful, low-maintenance plant that add tons of color to a garden! Their dainty, fragrant bell-like blooms come in shades of blue, pink, and purple and begin to appear in early summer and last until early fall. The easy-spread, clump-forming plants grow up to two feet tall, adding beauty at any height. Plus, they’re super easy to care for and bloom reliably. They’re a great choice for borders and butterfly gardens, and they’re deer resistant. Ladybells are a beautiful and hardworking addition to any garden!
